amendment.description: to provide for a paperwork reduction demonstration.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3149 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3149 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Santorum. (consideration: CR S5356-5360; text: CR S5356) to provide for a paperwork reduction demonstration.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3149 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Santorum.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3149 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
